subclusters.subcluster_name: Replicative Limit and Telomere-Associated Senescence Theory
Senescent Cell Accumulation and SASP-Driven Systemic Aging Theory
Neuronal and Brain Cellular Senescence with SASP in Neurodegeneration Theory

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Replicative Limit and Telomere-Associated Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on cell division-dependent senescence mechanisms including telomere shortening and threshold gene regulation causing growth arrest.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Replicative Limit and Telomere-Associated Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes senescence triggered by telomere shortening and tumor suppressor pathways, emphasizing replicative limits and DNA damage response.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Replicative Limit and Telomere-Associated Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explains limited proliferation as an intrinsic negative regulation linked to telomere shortening and DNA repair infidelity, controlling cell division.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Replicative Limit and Telomere-Associated Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights stress-induced senescence in chondrocytes including telomere-independent DNA damage and mitochondrial dysfunction contributing to tissue aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Replicative Limit and Telomere-Associated Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on DNA damage-induced senescence in vascular cells driving early vascular aging, linking DNA damage response to senescence and pathology.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Replicative Limit and Telomere-Associated Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes DNA damage response as a trigger and maintainer of senescence, linking persistent DNA damage to aging phenotypes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Replicative Limit and Telomere-Associated Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details senescence induced by telomere shortening, DNA damage, and oxidative stress affecting skeletal muscle aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Accumulation and SASP-Driven Systemic Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on accumulation of senescent cells with age and their SASP secretion causing tissue dysfunction and systemic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Accumulation and SASP-Driven Systemic Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes senescent cell accumulation and SASP as causal drivers of systemic aging and age-related diseases.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Accumulation and SASP-Driven Systemic Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights stable cell cycle arrest, SASP secretion, and accumulation of senescent cells driving tissue dysfunction and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Accumulation and SASP-Driven Systemic Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on senescent cell accumulation and SASP-mediated chronic inflammation contributing to systemic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Accumulation and SASP-Driven Systemic Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes senescent cells as causal drivers of systemic aging via SASP and their heterogeneity complicating targeting.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Accumulation and SASP-Driven Systemic Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes senescent cells' dual role, SASP secretion, and immune system decline leading to accumulation and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Accumulation and SASP-Driven Systemic Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on irreversible cell cycle arrest and SASP secretion contributing to chronic inflammation and age-related diseases.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Accumulation and SASP-Driven Systemic Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes senescence as a hallmark of aging with SASP-driven inflammation and systemic effects including cognitive decline.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Accumulation and SASP-Driven Systemic Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights paracrine and systemic spread of senescence via SASP factors causing multi-tissue aging phenotypes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Molecular Regulation of SASP via NF-κB and CK2 Signaling Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on molecular pathways regulating SASP expression through CK2 down-regulation and NF-κB activation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Evasion and Senescent Cell Accumulation via Immune Checkpoints Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes how senescent cells evade immune clearance by upregulating inhibitory immune checkpoints, promoting accumulation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP-Induced NAD+ Decline via CD38 Activation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links SASP secretion to induction of CD38 NADase in non-senescent cells, causing systemic NAD+ decline during aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Fibroblast Impairment of Wound Healing and Senolytic Therapy Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on senescent fibroblasts impairing wound healing via SASP and benefits of senolytic drugs in tissue repair.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Accumulation and SASP-Driven Systemic Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes senescence in skeletal muscle cells with SASP secretion causing inflammation and tissue dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Neuronal and Brain Cellular Senescence with SASP in Neurodegeneration Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on tau-induced neuronal senescence, SASP-mediated neurotoxicity, and senolytic treatment reducing neurodegeneration.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Neuronal and Brain Cellular Senescence with SASP in Neurodegeneration Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes accumulation of senescent brain cells including neurons with SASP contributing to neuroinflammation and cognitive decline.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Neuronal and Brain Cellular Senescence with SASP in Neurodegeneration Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details neuronal senescence features and SASP involvement in neurodegenerative diseases and epilepsy.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Accumulation and SASP-Driven Systemic Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes permanent cell cycle arrest, SASP secretion, apoptotic resistance, and accumulation of senescent cells driving aging.
